name: Reksio i Kretes: Sermageddon
summary: The temple of the Cheesegod has been stolen! The weather is going crazy… Could it be that the enraged Cheesegod is bringing Cheesemageddon down upon the Earth? Who would dare commit such a sacrilege? Pirates? Aliens? One thing is certain — our heroes will be forced to return to the darkest location of all their adventures — Paris.
